DOC.brief_summary: The primary aim of the study is to assess whether 6-months of vitamin D supplements can decrease PTH compared with placebo treatment in primary hyperparathyroidism.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Vitamin D Treatment in Primary Hyperparathyroidism
DOC.detailed_description: The study investigates effects and safety of six months of vitamin D supplementation before and after surgery in primary hyperparathyroidism. Effects are assessed as changes in calcium homeostasis, bone metabolism, quality of life, and muscle strength and function.
